channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: About
item.description: My test hugo site Overview # A Space is a place for Mode users to organize reports around a team, project, or common theme. Click on a Space to see a list of all of the reports in that Space. At the top of your screen, you can toggle between viewing all reports or archived reports. You can also sort reports by name or when they were created, last edited, or last run.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
